content.text: Hi! I just graduated college with my bachelor s degree in education. I'm a teacher who cares about my students' success, I draw comics, and I like to dance with my friends. What about you?

I'm a small business owner trying to make my mark in the horse racing industry. I'm a married woman who is struggling in my women's studies class but is happy with my life. I spend time tending to my flower beds to keep my mind clear and at peace. I am proud of my mixed heritage and wouldn't want to be any other way. I'm also currently on a diet.
That's awesome! I'm glad you're happy with your life. What's your favorite thing about being a small business owner?
I love being my own boss and having the freedom to make my own decisions. I also love the challenge of building a successful business.
Those are great reasons! What's your favorite thing about your flower beds?
I love the way they make my yard look beautiful and the peaceful feeling I get when I'm tending to them.
That's so nice! I'm glad you have something that brings you peace.
Thanks! I'm glad you're happy with your new job as a teacher. I'm sure you'll be a great teacher.
Thanks! I'm excited to start my career.
I'm sure you'll do great. What's your favorite thing about teaching?
I love working with kids and helping them learn. I also love seeing the excitement on their faces when they learn something new.
Those are great reasons! I'm sure you'll be a great teacher.
Thanks! I'm excited to start my career.
